column6:
Guest starring the X-Men! Now that one of Peter Parker's fellow students has been outted as a mutant, the struggle for their heart and mind is on! Magneto, Master of Magnetism, claims the new mutant as his own, but the X-Men aren't about to let that stand! It's a battle royale that rages across the city with the web-slinger caught in the middle! The dream tag-team of Brian Michael Bendis and Stuart Immonen deliver the finale to "Spider-Man and his Amazing Friends!",2008,3
Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | inker:Wade von Grawbadger | penciller (cover):Stuart Immonen | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Justin Ponsor
